about.title: Research and Training Center on
about.description: The Research and Training Center on SME Financing in Central Africa (CReFF-PME) is an academic institution dedicated to knowledge production, capacity building and innovative support for African entrepreneurs. We work for a better understanding of the challenges of financing small and medium enterprises, while contributing to the development of solutions adapted to the local context.

aboutView.heroSubtitle: on SME Financing in Central Africa
aboutView.heroDescription: An excellence space for scientific production, training and knowledge dissemination on SME financing in Central Africa

genesis.title: The origin of
genesis.paragraph1: The CReFF-PME Center finds its origin in doctoral research conducted by Mr. Jean Nsonsumuna, in co-supervision between ULB and Kongo University, on the success conditions for launching crowdfunding (participatory financing) in DRC.
genesis.paragraph2: Faced with the many constraints on access to financing for Congolese SMEs identified, CReFF was designed as a space for scientific production, training and knowledge dissemination on SME financing, while aiming to strengthen the skills of local entrepreneurs and researchers.

mission.title: Train and support
mission.paragraph1: CReFF-Entrepreneurs is dedicated to training and supporting entrepreneurs in Central Africa. We offer training programs tailored to the specific needs of SMEs and local entrepreneurs.
mission.paragraph2: Our mission is to strengthen entrepreneurial capacities, facilitate access to financing and contribute to the sustainable economic development of the region.

faq1.question: Are the trainings free?
faq1.answer: Some trainings are free, others may have modest registration fees. Check the details of each program for more information.

faq2.question: Who can participate in the trainings?
faq2.answer: Our trainings are open to all entrepreneurs, project leaders and SME managers in Central Africa, regardless of their level of experience.

faq3.question: How to register for a program?
faq3.answer: You can register via the registration form on this page, or contact us directly by email or phone. We will respond within 24 hours.

faq4.question: Are the trainings certified?
faq4.answer: Yes, at the end of each training, you will receive a certificate of participation issued by CReFF-PME in partnership with Kongo University and ULB.
